CustomField.formula: IF(AND( Is_Unit__c , ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.Transaction_Type__c,'Rental')), IF(SBQQ__Quote__r.Branch__c !='BOXX CL Martin', SBQQ__RequiredBy__r.Monthly_Amount_Calc__c / SBQQ__RequiredBy__r.Number_of_Units_in_Complex__c , SBQQ__RequiredBy__r.CLM_Unit_Revenue__c / (Subscription_Term_Quote__c * SBQQ__RequiredBy__r.Number_of_Units_in_Complex__c ) ), 0 )
CustomField.label: Unit Rental Rate
